title: Skip and Loafer
originalTitle: スキップとローファー
overview: Iwakura Mitsumi, a tenacious country girl, prepares for high school in the big city. She meets the handsome Shima Sousuke, whose easygoing ways help her adapt in the real world.

tv.originalShowTitle: スキップとローファー
tv.episodeOverview: Heading into self-intros, Mitsumi is a nervous wreck. Nao-chan tries to ease her fears, but she makes a choice that she will end up regretting.
